Posts.EditableText: My visual basic game engine project currently has the ability to use VBScript in order to add extra features to the game. This was a pre-built in feature when I downloaded the base code, but I'd like to replace the VBScript with something else, originally or existing. If anybody can give me something to read or advice on adding scripting abilities to a VB project, please post here
Posts.HTML:
My visual basic game engine project currently has the ability to use VBScript in order to add extra features to the game. This was a pre-built in feature when I downloaded the base code, but I'd like to replace the VBScript with something else, originally or existing.

If anybody can give me something to read or advice on adding scripting abilities to a VB project, please post here
